main event: Multiple observers reported seeing a round, pulsing, multi-colored object moving through the sky over Michigan on April 22, 1966.
interesting points: The object was reported to change shape from round to oval to round again.
The object grew in size from the size of a dime to the size of a truck wheel.
The object made a 'right angle turn' and disappeared behind trees.
One observer reported the object breaking into two parts, with one larger than the other, before disappearing.
The object was reported to emit a blue flame and sparks like a 'long pencil' on one side and then the other.
